attributes.action: Investigate Virgin Media over the recent Broadband Bandwidth Throttling that has been unfairly imposed upon customers during the peak periods between 4PM and Midnight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: VirginMedia which was formed from the buyout of Telewest/NTL in 2006 have removed without consultation with its customer base Sky Broadcasting channels such as Sky One and Sky News. In addition all levels of broadband have been throttled during the peak periods between 4pm and midnight with those on the 10mb and (if you are lucky enough to live in an area with the 20mb service) are throttled back to 5mb despite paying for a 10mb service.
